Question: This person decided to attend Louisiana Tech University in Ruston, Louisiana.
Hints: In 2006, this person returned to the silver screen in the motion picture Failure to Launch.
In his 14-season career, this person completed 2,025 of 3,901 passes for 27,989 yards and 212 touchdowns.
This person has in later years made light of the ridicule with quips such as "it's football, not rocket science.".
